title: Complete Fantasy Soundtrack
description: 30+ minutes of professional-quality orchestral music to accompany your fantasy-themed game.
longDescription:
Audio preview: <a href="https://soundcloud.com/amcmillan/sets/complete-fantasy-soundtrack">https://soundcloud.com/amcmillan/sets/complete-fantasy-soundtrack</>

A professional-quality orchestral soundtrack made to accompany games with a fantasy or medieval setting.

The soundtrack comprises 30+ minutes of original music written for exploration, battle, dungeon-crawling and tavern settings. Also included are situational "stings" for events such as the player solving a puzzle or leveling up. All tracks are edited to seamlessly loop without glitches or artifacts, with individual loop sections provided for the battle themes in order for them to play back indefinitely as long as the game requires it.

Themes included:
- Battle A (Clashing Blades) - full version, plus individual loop sections 
- Battle B (Pursuing the Enemy) - full version, plus individual loop sections 
- Battle C (The Winning Side) - full version, plus individual loop sections 
- Explore A (Along the Mountain Pass) 
- Explore B (Through the Forest) 
- Explore C (Midsummer’s Day) 
- Explore D (Lone Adventurer) 
- Explore E (Dawn) 
- Explore F (Dusk) 
- Explore G (The Valley) 
- Dungeon A (Danger Lurks) 
- Dungeon B (The Dark) 
- Dungeon C (Forgotten Treasure) 
- Tavern (A Game of Chance) 
- Stings A through G
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 31 
Number of Audio Cues: 31 
Sample rate \ bit rate: (i.e. 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs): 16 bit, 44.1kHz Stereo WAV

Does music\audio loop: Yes/No — YES for tracks labelled Loop A/B/C. Other tracks will loop, but not to create an infinitely long track. They have a defined start/finish. 
How many sound FX: 0 
How many minutes of audio provided: 33 minutes including loop sections (30 minutes excluding individual loop sections).
